about.title: About
about.description: My name is Davíð V. Arnalds and I am an Systems Anylist and Electronics Engineer. I specialize in Web/Software Development, IT and technical services and Electronics repair.

focuspanel.description1: Custom build beautiful, reactive and well structured websites to meet the customer's needs
focuspanel.description2: Build web services, web developemnt, changes and modifications
focuspanel.description3: Help customers host websites, email and databases in cloud services
focuspanel.description4: Consulting, computer services and electronics repair/setup

service.title: Services
service.description: Standard Solutions pride themselves on delivering personal, professional services at resonable prices.
service.servicedescription1: Build websites, web services and other software from scratch or join existing projects per customers request
service.servicedescription2: Wordpress website development for small to mid size companies eCommerce, Booking and Information Websites
service.servicedescription3: Assist with computer hardware/software issues, software/hardware installation and repair
